title: Structured Matrix Basis for Multivariate Time Series Forecasting with Interpretable Dynamics

abstract: Multivariate time series forecasting is of central importance in modern intelligent decision systems. The dynamics of multivariate time series are jointly characterized by temporal dependencies and spatial correlations. Hence, it is equally important to …

title: Credal Deep Ensembles for Uncertainty Quantification
details: K Wang, F Cuzzolin, SK Manchingal, K Shariatmadar… - The Thirty-eighth Annual …
abstract: This paper introduces an innovative approach to classification called Credal Deep Ensembles (CreDEs), namely, ensembles of novel Credal-Set Neural Networks (CreNets). CreNets are trained to predict a lower and an upper probability bound for …
